channel.title: front page hanging/errors
channel.description:
Whenever I load up the front page, from a new instance of Firefox, I have have about 1 second of time before it hangs, I can't interact in any way with the website; like clicking links, scrolling, etc.
[url='https://img535.imageshack.us/i/bm1v.png/'][img]https://img535.imageshack.us/img535/3338/bm1v.th.png[/img][/url]
It looks like this for about a minute, then changes to this:
[url='https://img638.imageshack.us/i/bm2w.png/'][img]https://img638.imageshack.us/img638/9482/bm2w.th.png[/img][/url]
I can then interact with the page again, the black text disappears when the next image rotation occurs, and the site looks normal again.
I have no further problems with the site even if i navigate away an come back; its only with a new instance of Firefox.

item.title: front page hanging/errors
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
Thanks, but because I use my laptop mainly for work, I need something that’s as stable as possible

Read full topic

item.title: front page hanging/errors

item.description:
I’ve started getting this error in the last few days. Running Firefox 3.6.13

Doesn’t respond until refreshed. So not a major problem just slightly annoying

item.title: front page hanging/errors
item.dc:creator: orange_cat
item.description:
They all run different profiles, along with -no-remote so they happily run side-by-side.

Left to right: 3.6.13, 4b9 (it updated), vanilla 3.6.13.

Read full topic

item.title: front page hanging/errors
item.dc:creator: orange_cat
item.description:
Oops forgot my version, that would be helpful.
3.6.13.

Also I just made a fresh install of the same version, so it wont be any add-ons, I get the same results.

In addition, it doesn’t do it in FF4b7.

I now have 3 installs of Firefox.

Read full topic

Whenever I load up the front page, from a new instance of Firefox, I have have about 1 second of time before it hangs, I can’t interact in any way with the website; like clicking links, scrolling, etc.

It looks like this for about a minute, then changes to this:

I can then interact with the page again, the black text disappears when the next image rotation occurs, and the site looks normal again.

I have no further problems with the site even if i navigate away an come back; its only with a new instance of Firefox.
